parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token used to start the query. Set the value to the NextToken value obtained from the response to the preceding request.

parameters.name: PrivatePoolOptions.Id
parameters.description: The ID of the elasticity assurance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the elasticity assurance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
